attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Compassion and freedom for Ronnie Biggs is the right thing to do, he is unable to harm anyone or commit any more crime,keeping an old man under lock and key smacks of spite on the part of government and is a waste of taxpayer's money!

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
